title: A Reproducible Pipeline for Creating QR Codes in R
text:
Overview
This report presents a reproducible workflow for generating QR codes in R.
You can also use the qr_code() function from the rutils package to automate the process.
For more details about the implementation, see the README in the code repository.

If you find this project useful, please consider giving it a star!

title: A Reproducible Pipeline for Creating QR Codes in R
text:
Set the Environment
Load Packages

library(here)
library(magick)
library(qrcode)
library(rsvg)

Set Initial Variables

link <- "https://github.com/danielvartan"


logo <- here("images", "github-icon.svg")


frame <- here("images", "qr-code-frame.svg")

title: A Reproducible Pipeline for Creating QR Codes in R
text:
Generate the QR Code

qr_code <- link |> qr_code(ecl = "H")


qr_code |>
  generate_svg(
    filename = here("images", "qr-code.svg"),
    size = 530,
    show = FALSE
  )
